articles.author: Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: France to deliver ‘light tanks’ to Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Emmanuel Macron would be the first leader to send Western-designed armored fighting vehicles to the warzone.
articles.content: PARIS France will deliver “light” battle tanks to Ukraine, President Emmanuel Macron’s office announced Wednesday, which would make it the first country to send such Western-designed armored fighting… [+1563 chars]

articles.title: Salesforce to cut staff by 10% and close some offices - The Irish Times
articles.description: New European headquarters for software group currently being build by Johnny Ronan at Spencer Place overlooking river Liffey
articles.content: Salesforce said on Wednesday that it would lay off about 10 per cent of its employees and close some offices as a part of its restructuring plan, becoming the latest technology company to undertake c… [+3065 chars]
